abstract.t: This draft provides requirements for the support of generalized multi-protocol label switching (GMPLS) inter-domain traffic engineering (TE). Its main objective is to present the differences between MPLS inter-domain TE and GMPLS inter-domain TE. This draft covers not only GMPLS Inter-domain architecture but also functional requirements in terms of GMPLS signaling and routing in order to specify these in a GMPLS Inter-domain environment.
